name: Protect Poseidon!
description:
Going about your normal day, all of a sudden the sea creatures turn on you! Luckily you always have your trusty mermaid to protect you.

Move with WASD

Attack (Hold Space Bar)

Restart with R

I made this game for ScroreSpace Jam #17 in 72 hours using Unity.

Post your highscore!

01/31/22 - Fixed critical bug not causing game over
